Uses of Package
geometries

Packages that use geometries
Package Description
geometries  
primitives  
renderer  
scene  
  • Classes in geometries used by geometries
    Class Description
    BoundingBox
    class represents axis-aligned bounding box, it is used to check if ray is in the area of a geometry by checking if the ray direction come with intersection in the bounding box of the geometry.
    Container
    class to contain the proper methods for setting a bounding box for both geometry and geometries
    FlatGeometry
    this class represents all kinds of flat shapes - plane, polygon, triangle
    Geometries
    this class represents a group of shapes in the space that represent a picture.
    Geometry
    interface for all shapes in the space, objects with material and emission fields, and getNormal method (and has the possibility to be intersected)
    Intersectable
    An Interface for Composite Design Pattern The Composite Class - Geometries The Basic Classes - all the specific geometries
    Intersectable.GeoPoint
    Helper class representing a point on a geometry surface
    Plane
    Class Plane is 2D basic object in geometry which represented by two vectors which come from the same point and have different directions (together reflecting the basic 2D object.)
    Polygon
    Polygon class represents two-dimensional polygon in 3D Cartesian coordinate system
    RadialGeometry
    this class represents all kinds of radial shapes - sphere, tube, cylinder contains the radius for the shape
    Tube
    Class Tube represent a smooth infinite surface, curvature at every point on its face fixed.
  • Classes in geometries used by primitives
    Class Description
    Intersectable.GeoPoint
    Helper class representing a point on a geometry surface
  • Classes in geometries used by renderer
    Class Description
    Intersectable.GeoPoint
    Helper class representing a point on a geometry surface
  • Classes in geometries used by scene
    Class Description
    Geometries
    this class represents a group of shapes in the space that represent a picture.
